intro.title: If you need a developer, then I want to develop.
intro.name: PJ Oschmann
intro.blurb: Student at Baldwin Wallace - Graduating May 2025
intro.description: Hey there! I'm PJ Oschmann, a senior software engineering student at Baldwin Wallace University. I bring passion, a strong work ethic, and grit to all the work I do - whether it be a hobby programming project or an important job with a deadline.
